mapper.select: SELECT /*org.okestro.tps.api.infrastructure.persistence.mapper.TbTpsCm052QueryMapper.selectPplnMapngInfoList*/ WRKFLW_EXCN_NO , WRKFLW_INPT_NO , PPLN_NO , PPLN_VSRN , INOUT_SE , BIZ_NO , TASK_AUTHRT_USE_YN , TASK_AUTHRT_CD , PRCR_ID , STTS_CD , REG_DT , RGTR_ID , MDFCN_DT , MDFR_ID FROM TB_TPS_CM_052

SELECT /*org.okestro.tps.api.infrastructure.persistence.mapper.TbTpsCm052QueryMapper.selectPplnMapngInfo*/ WRKFLW_EXCN_NO , WRKFLW_INPT_NO , PPLN_NO , PPLN_VSRN , INOUT_SE , BIZ_NO , TASK_AUTHRT_USE_YN , TASK_AUTHRT_CD , PRCR_ID , STTS_CD , REG_DT , RGTR_ID , MDFCN_DT , MDFR_ID FROM TB_TPS_CM_052 WHERE WRKFLW_EXCN_NO = #{wrkflwExcnNo} AND WRKFLW_INPT_NO = #{wrkflwInptNo}
